lines.Player: Who are you, bring forth your lord at once.

lines.Lieutenant: I take no orders from the likes of you.

lines.Player: Soyour just one of his dogs.
Why did you burn my village? We had nothing to do with your wars...
Why did you kill my... friend

lines.Lieutenant: To think our prize would work right in to our hands
Prepare yourself peasant. My lord wouldn't like it if I killed you.
But you won't be needing all those limbs.
